name: Where's Waldo? The Fantastic Journey
summary:
Join the search for Waldo, his friends and more! 
 
Based on the hit publishing series, Where's Waldo?: The Fantastic Journey is the ultimate search and find adventure for the whole family! 
 
Features 
 
• Search and Find: Twelve fantastic worlds of oddities and adventure 
• Unlock new challenges for unlimited fun: As you progress in the game, unlock new items to find from new characters to unexpected and hilarious objects 
• Split-screen multiplayer mode: Who can spot Waldo first? Challenge other players to a game and unlock power ups along the way!
